They're the only ones doing it, and they're doing it very well. Accurate with good TL notes.
Nice subbing and karaoke

I can't thank you enough for subbing Pokemon.
It was so sad 4Kids did such bad translations.
However, there's still a lot of episodes to go, before Pokemon is over; good luck with these, hope you will finish at least the 1rst season one day ;D
They are the only ones doing it, and I have no complaints about the quality.

They are very good and they are literally the only pokemon group subbing the pokemon episodes. They have done all of best wishes and xy so they may take a while to sub but its better than no sub. Keep up ghe great work
Many great idiomatic translations. Did not rely on dubs.
Only 50 out of 276 episodes done, and they haven't subtitles an episode of the original series since 2014.

Great subs, just wish they had all the episodes
Overall a really solid translation, including all the subtle jokes/puns. The font used is easy to read and all characters have differently colored lines.
very slow at season 1

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Pokemon Diamond & Pearl

Good Comments: Even though they're slow at releasing episodes, they're a pretty awesome group. They're pretty faithful to the show, nice karaoke, and the translation is awesome! :D
Faithful to the show
Nice translation and karaokes. Also, punctuality at the hour of releasing.

Needs better typography. Translations themselves could be better too. Seriously, just b/c it's Pokemon doesn't mean the Typography needs to be bad. It's Pokemon, not hard to translate. Attitude also stinks.

I like this subbing group because the Japanese episodes are finally being subbed by a subbing group. I like how the text has different colour changes according to who is speaking and who are speaking and the Japanese subbing looks accurate, based on me. I

The videos are always high quality, the text is easy to read, different colours for different characters and great karaoke. Better than DB who had poor quality translation and the text looked horrible.

Only downside is #PM are elitist, but their subs are
Top-notch translations, generally prompt.

the reason to get back into pocket monsters,  releases look amazing on my 32", stunning karaoke effects, like the different color font idea, and quality over speed, but a little bummed they dropped 720p encodes, i can understand why though

Great an accurate. Some inconsistencies when naming attacks, but overall they done a great job subbing this series to the end from where they picked up.
I like the different color text but it sometimes takes them a month to get an episode out but not a huge complaint
Episodes are rushed.  Not good with people.  The styles are unreadable.  Another word to describe the group, Elitist.
Just a FYI to everyone: From July 2010 and forward, if you want to aquire their subs, you MUST go to their irc, write !Fst, set up a working fserve. Their tracker is closed.

I love this group. Awesome subs, can't think of any better way to do it. Incredible quality on the translations & encoding, and I like the "different colors according to who is speaking" thing. Brings life to it.

great subs, but S L O W as molasses
